detail_desc: High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and an ankle strap that is elasticated at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and a motif on the front. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a gathered seam at the shoulders and frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Wide, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pre-tied bow ties in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.

Short dress in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and side pockets. Yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with an opening at the top and small stand-up collar with gathers around it and a tie at the front. Low dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the hips and hem. Partly lined.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-stud fastening. Tie belt at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ties under the chin and earflaps. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted top with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave. Elastication around the top, short sleeves with a double frill, buttons down the front and a drawstring at the waist.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the hips and a tiered skirt.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and tapered legs with foldover ribbing at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long bikini top in fluted, crinkled fabric with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and discreet elastication at the hem. Gathers in the sides and an inner top with an elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt with a small flounce at the hem. Lined.

Set with a dress, a pair of leggings and a hairband in cotton jersey. Dress with a sequined bodice, concealed press-stud on one shoulder, cap sleeves and skirt in a double layer of tulle with a foil print. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. Hairband with a sewn-on tulle bow.
Small handbag with a handle and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 4.5 cm. Height 14 cm. Width 27.5 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Oversized sports top in fast-drying jersey with a deep neckline at the back with horizontal straps at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.
Oversized, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with short slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Imitation leather sandals with square toes, narrow straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Heel 5 cm.
A-line skirt in twill made from a cotton blend with fake pockets and buttons at the front.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Shortie briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Metal necklaces in various lengths and designs. One with a faceted plastic pendant and two with round, embossed pendants. Length 48 cm, 59 cm and 71.5 cm.
Short dress in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and side pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Voluminous, knee-length dress in jersey with concealed elastication and a frill trim around the top. Wide, bow-topped shoulder straps and a gathered seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Zip at the top, two zipped outer compartments and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 5.5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 23 cm.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, a text print on one leg, a back pocket and roll-edge hems.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with 3/4-length sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short smocked top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and overlocked edges at the hem.
Boxy-style top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Shorts in an airy viscose and linen weave. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a frill trim at the top and detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide legs.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elastication with a small frill trim at the top and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, an elasticated seam with a drawstring under the bust, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly, decorative seams, pleated sections, zips and skinny legs.
Scarf in a pleated weave with raw, frayed edges on the short sides. Size 80x150 cm.
Jumper in a soft, lightweight knit with a rounded collar in contrasting colour woven fabric. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide, calf-length, double-breasted coat in twill made from an Italian wool blend. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and a short slit at the hems.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Thin sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and jersey sections at the hems.
Jersey-lined corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and one back pocket.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with an open back with satin ribbons at the bottom.
T-shirts in cotton jersey with a soft, brushed finish.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, wrapover jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a large, frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar in a cotton weave and a small opening with narrow ties at the neck. Dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is partly recycled.

Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cargo trousers in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed button and flap leg pockets. Reinforced section at the back, seams at the knees and a drawstring at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a rectangular silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.5 cm.

Straight-cut jacket in a crisp pima cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest and front pockets, gently dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Thin tights with a glittery pattern and an elasticated waist.
